author: Vertexgaming
comment: Useless junk for the keylink. I need to have the app open to detect my phone via the keylink. It's absolutely counterintuitive that when I have to launch the Keylink app kill running apps or reboot my phone. Failed to find my phone every single time I really needed to use the keylink for its main purpose.

author: Jason Ambrose
comment: What's the point of asking for a permission if I can't say NO??? This app should not need my location to work...Makes me think buying a Moto 360 was a mistake since I can't even control it's options now. Thanks Motorola

author: Shamshuddin Shaikh
comment: I m using moto pulse Bluetooth headphone, but the app always shows 70% battery status and I am not able to make and receive calls. Mobile - Moto e3 power

author: Eunice Iniguez
comment: Every time I try to change the watchface it crashes in my S7 edge. Used to work great on my note 5  Update: uninstalled this trash app. I am now using a LG V20 and it continues to crash. I wish they would have fixed this by now. It used to be a great app Update again: this app still sucks on my note 8. Same issue

author: Madeline Koller
comment: The last location thing isn't very accurate, and beyond that it isn't very useful. You can't map functions or set notification vibrations the way you can on LG's Talk/Tone app.

author: Keerthika Reddy
comment: I don't know what's wrong with the app. It used to work properly all these days. But from two days it isn't even connecting with the Moto pulse headphones. What's wrong?! It won't even detect the headphones! Hell of a app!!!

author: Joowon
comment: Rediculous permissions. All I want to do it change the picture on the background of my watch and I have to give location and contacts permission??  It even asks at one point 'are you in?' and the only option is yes. Instant uninstall and would rate less than 1 star if possible.

author: Corey-Jason Saile
comment: Utter garbage data collection app. Connecting my headphones to my phone through Bluetooth using the app ONLY ALLOWED THE HEADPHONES TO WORK DURING PHONECALLS, NOT WITH MEDIA, NOT ABLE TO PLACE CALLS OR MAKE VOICE COMMANDS. I needed to delete and flash updated drivers and then connect the headphones to the phone using the phones system dialog. Most users would not be able to fix this without customer support. I now understand why these headphones were $19.99 in the clearance bin at Target. Promptly deleted app as it collects both the users and users contacts personal information to resell to third parties for spam mail and phone calls...

author: aba daba
comment: Unnecessarily intrusive permissions. No, I don't want my devices linked through the cloud on YOUR servers. I just want to use my headphones. Uninstalling.

Don't waste your time with this garbage, there is nothing you can do to get it to work reliability... It will drive you crazy...  I'll do you one better, just avoid Bluetooth LE (low energy) in general... Android is full of bugs with that, just search for "Bluetooth LE problem android" on Google, and you will find thousands of posts about it...  You're welcome!

author: Richard Shoemaker
comment: Problems since Android Wear 2.x update.  Why do developers need to break things that work perfectly with updates.  Moto Connect needs some patches for A.W. 2.0

author: Ananya Joshi
comment: It's a good app if you know what you're doing. People generally don't have an idea as to what to do and how to use the app. Also, I came across a problem. While finding my phone via power pack, the app crashes. It'd be great if that could be fixed ASAP.

author: Brian Schmidt
comment: Well after receiving my first 360 moto Smartwatch, this app would NOT let me change or customize my face watch to a specific one that I wanted. I Uninstalled the app and re downloaded and it ended up fixing the problem. This should be a fixed problem and relatively easy to fix. Overall it does what it's ment to.

author: Hashim Tahir
comment: Totally useless application. Not giving any useful option for watch. Majority of the functions are already available on Android Wear. Plus there is no Android wear 2 uptill now for my Moto 360 2nd generation.

author: Jigar Shah
comment: Its basic necessary app. Miss 2 things.  1. widget so i can find my key (power pack micro)  2. A watch app to find my keys and vice versa.

author: knight marius
comment: i don`t know if it`s an error or my watch but when i install moto connect on my smartphone i have connection issues between them (i lose connection). They connect ok when i uninstalled moto connect.

author: Connie Weils
comment: This app continuously crashes. I am not able to select a new background image on my watch. Very annoying.

author: K S
comment: Over all I enjoy using the app, the only thing that I really hate is the fact that when I try to change my watch face the app always closes. I have reported this several times still with no success. I have even factory reset my watch and uninstalled/reinstalled this app but still no success. I used to have my children on my watch face and  now it seems like I'll never be able to change it again. Maybe they aren't fixing it because I have the Motorola Sport and the Android 2.0 update is soon to be happening but who knows. All I really know is it sucks because that's a feature I am missing out on that  I would like to have.

author: Raktim Kanti Bhowmick
comment: It's very frustrating to know that my moto device can't find out Power Pack Moto but other brands can find that easily. Very pathetic.

author: Cindy M
comment: I keep trying to add faces and the pop up says its not connected...after several reports ,its an ongoing thing...I love the options, but 1/2 the time I can't add a new face,I've rebooted, deleted the app, and reinstated it...losing a lot of great faces I had saved. I wish they would/could fix this!!! Then I would give it 5*'s

author: Andrew Kulich
comment: Trying to use one of my own images as a watch face keeps crashing the app. Outside of picking pre-made ones, this app is useless.

author: Christoffer Lilja
comment: (solved, did a factory reset of the watch) Is this not compatible with Moto 360 2gen with Wear 2.0?

author: Neel Soni
comment: ABOUT WEAR : Bug. When my phone is locked anyone can turn on/off Bluetooth, no password is asking for it.  I connect my watch with Bluetooth so any can take my phone and turn off Bluetooth and i will disconnect. and no matter that my phone is locked or not. I can also hide Bluetooth option from notification bar but that is not the solution because have to use it more for connecting any thing.

author: Steve Hunter
comment: Your not being cleaver asking for permission to sync my info to your cloud service and giving me one choice "yes" or I can't use your app . This sort of restriction should be on the box. As I say not cleaver because I will think twice before my next Motorola purchase.

author: Shreyas Shetty
comment: I have Moto power pack micro, if mobile is misplaced and need to be traced, we just have to press power pack button 2 times & mobile will continuously keep making sound But problem is, to make mobile to make sound while tried to track from power pack 1. Bluetooth has to be ON 2. this Moto connect app has to be running 3. If Bluetooth is off, you cannot locate the phone 4. If this app was not opened even though Bluetooth is turned ON, Mobile will be not able to tracked..  This is just waste of money. even china made smart watches have the same concept which is available for way more less price than MOTO price. If this MOTO has to stand apart among chinese brand, they have to have different working system.. If you can locate only when Bluetooth is turned ON & app is running, what more different u did compared with Chinese makes? Even chinese made has the same concept & selling at less price. It's better to go other chinese brand instead of this hyped Moto gadget
This app doesn't even recognize my Moto Pulse Escape. Utter waste

author: Simran Monga
comment: Everything works well with micro power pack except for the find my phone feature, when engaged it crashes the app. I'm using s7 edge indian version on stock touchwiz nougat non rooted, I hope the team will get to this ASAP

author: Euler Alves
comment: It works but it's useless since you can do all using Google Wear app or on watch.  I'm giving 5 because I trust in Motorola and that is just branded app to replace Google Wear

author: George Thomas
comment: Unable to connect to pulse escape headphones using the app. It works fine with vanilla bluetooth

author: gsgehwshss yssndh jsusw yssgsjssvwy
comment: Meh and get a few more things and then you a PhD student I am so far and the email list for rent on Monday and I hope to hear back and I will get you a check or cash is me I will get back with you in a couple of days to see u player in and I'll see if I got a few things I need a few more minutes to get the girls together for the girls and I will send it when

author: Jay Thanki
comment: AW 2.0 deployment to Moto 360 V2 has destroyed my watch! Pathetic support, no patches and as a company have let so many people down!

author: Scot Hagen
comment: App won't go past location option unless you turn it on. Only reason I can see is for snooping since I don't want to use the locate function. Uninstalled it.

author: Toks0ner Blissneso5
comment: Bought a moto360 gen 2 two days ago and can't connect my watch. This app is completely broken. Pick your game up!

author: Aryan Garg
comment: This app won't let me connect to my Moto Pulse escape, when it is a part of the pulse series, it should be support it... Correct me if I'm wrong.

author: James M
comment: I have a Moto 360 and this app is practically useless as it is not needed. I can do everything from the Android Wear app or on the watch itself.

author: Aurimas Lab
comment: Android 7.0 support, but still no Nougat update to pure android Moto X Style 2015. Shame on you, Motorola!

author: Aravind V.V
comment: Sorry to say but i can't even connect my headphones( motorola pulse escape ) with this app. Really a huge disappointment.

author: Nicholas Irvine
comment: I'm having issues loading custom backgrounds on my 360 watch face through this app. The app keeps closing. For Android 6.0.1.

author: Supratim Samanta
comment: The Motorola Surround does not show the battery percentage properly. The Moto 360 connects properly.

author: pranav kulkarni
comment: The main letdown is i tried every way of connecting pulse escape headphones but everything in vain.Its just not connecting . disappointed
